review_blob:
I thought it was very very very well brewed. One of my favorite beers of all time actually. Very smooth. Tastes like a grapefruit sprinkled with sugar. Has bits of pine and mango in there as well. Very delicious.

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Nice thick head with a dark brown body. Slight with a hint of red. Flavors consist of dark fruits. Mainly raisin and plum. Small note of coffee. Delicious snack beer

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone
